properties.entry: INSERT INTO SHELTER ( MEM_NO , SH_NAME , SH_PHONE , SH_ADDRESS , SH_ABOUT , SH_LOCAL ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
